issue.title: Splitwise App
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

**Features:**
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups, add expenses
- Split equally, view balances

**Tech:** Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, SQLite, NextAuth.js

**Pages:** Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Create project foundation with Next.js 14 setup, including package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, Google OAuth provider, better-sqlite3, shadcn/ui, Tailwind), tsconfig.json with strict mode, .gitignore for Next.js, and initialize basic project structure (app/ directory, components/, lib/, prisma/ for SQLite schema).
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system and database layer. Create NextAuth.js configuration with Google OAuth provider, design and implement SQLite database schema for users, groups, expenses, and balances using Prisma ORM. Build all database models, migrations, and seed data. Owns: lib/auth.ts, lib/prisma.ts, prisma/schema.prisma, app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts.

workers.task: Set up Prisma ORM with SQLite database. Create prisma/schema.prisma with User, Group, Expense, ExpenseSplit, and Balance models. Run initial migration and create seed data file. All work in prisma/ directory only.

Create Prisma client singleton in lib/prisma.ts. Configure Google OAuth provider credentials and session management in lib/auth.ts. Create environment variable template in .env.example for DATABASE_URL and Google OAuth credentials. All work in lib/ directory and .env.example only.

Create NextAuth.js API route handler in app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts. This route will use the configuration from lib/auth.ts and Prisma client from lib/prisma.ts. Only modifies the route.ts file in the NextAuth API directory.

ems.task: Build core application logic and API routes. Implement group creation/management, expense creation with equal splitting logic, balance calculation algorithms, and all CRUD operations. Create RESTful API endpoints for groups and expenses. Owns: app/api/groups/, app/api/expenses/, lib/calculations.ts, lib/actions.ts for server actions.

workers.task: Create group data model, schema, and CRUD operations. Implement SQLite table schema for groups (id, name, created_at, created_by), TypeScript types for Group model, and database operations (create, read, update, delete groups). All group-related database logic.

Create expense data model, schema, and CRUD operations with equal-split logic. Implement SQLite table schema for expenses (id, group_id, description, amount, created_by, created_at), Expense TypeScript types, database CRUD operations, and split calculation logic (amount / number of members). All expense-related database and calculation logic.

Create balance calculation algorithms and all API routes. Implement balance calculation logic (total owed/owing per user across all groups), TypeScript types for Balance, and RESTful API endpoints: POST /api/groups, GET /api/groups, GET /api/groups/[id], POST /api/expenses, GET /api/expenses, GET /api/expenses?groupId=X, GET /api/balance?groupId=X.

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages. Build landing page, login/logout flow, dashboard with group overview, group detail pages with expense lists and balance views. Integrate shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, etc.) with Tailwind styling. Owns: app/page.tsx, app/login/page.tsx, app/dashboard/page.tsx, app/group/[id]/page.tsx, components/ui/, components/expense-form.tsx, components/balance-card.tsx.

workers.task: Create landing page and login/logout flow with Google OAuth integration. Build app/page.tsx (landing page with hero section, CTA buttons, feature highlights), app/login/page.tsx (login page with OAuth button), and configure NextAuth.js in app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts for Google OAuth with session management.

Build dashboard page with group overview functionality. Create app/dashboard/page.tsx displaying user's groups with statistics, components/group-card.tsx for individual group display, components/create-group-dialog.tsx for group creation modal, and lib/api/groups.ts for group data fetching.

Create group detail pages with expense lists, balance views, and expense creation. Build app/group/[id]/page.tsx (main group detail page), components/expense-list.tsx (scrollable expense items), components/expense-form.tsx (add expense modal), components/balance-card.tsx (member balance display), components/ui/*.tsx (install and configure shadcn/ui: button, card, input, dialog, scroll-area, badge, avatar components with Tailwind styling), and lib/api/expenses.ts for expense operations.

analysisSummary: Build a complete expense-sharing application with Google OAuth authentication, group management, expense tracking, and balance calculations. Tech stack: Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, SQLite database, and NextAuth.js.
